info.updatedServerCount: Updated server count. Connected to {SERVER_COUNT} total servers.
info.unsubRanPremiumCmd: User '{SENDER_TAG}' ({SENDER_ID}) in guild '{GUILD_NAME}' ({GUILD_ID}) that is unsubscribed ran the premium command.
info.unsubRanSubCmd: User '{SENDER_TAG}' ({SENDER_ID}) in guild '{GUILD_NAME}' ({GUILD_ID}) that is unsubscribed ran the subscribe command.

error.retrieveShards: An error occurred while retrieving which shards to spawn.
error.shardInfo: An error occurred while retrieving shard info.
error.spawnShard: An error occurred while spawning shards.
error.updateServerCount: An error occurred while updating the server count.
error.updateServerCountSite: An error occurred while updating the server count on '{BOT_SITE}'.
error.login: An error occurred while the client attempted to login.
error.guildJoin: An error occurred while processing a guild join.
error.guildLeave: An error occurred while processing a guild leave.
error.job: An error occurred while running the '{JOB}' job.
error.resolveGuild: Guild '{GUILD_NAME}' ({GUILD_ID}) was not in the cache and couldn't be fetched.
error.message: An error occurred while processing a message.
error.reaction: An error occurred while processing a reaction.
error.rateLimit: A rate limit was hit while making a request.
error.commandDm: [{MESSAGE_ID}] An error occurred while executing the '{COMMAND_NAME}' command for user '{SENDER_TAG}' ({SENDER_ID}) in direct message.
error.birthdayJob: An error occurred while running the birthday job.
error.messagePartial: An error occurred while trying to fetch a message partial.
error.userFetch: An error occurred while trying to fetch the users of a reaction.
error.fetchMembers: An error occurred while trying to fetch the members for the guild '{GUILD_NAME}' ({GUILD_ID}).
error.fetchMemberError: An error occurred while trying to fetch the members for '{GUILD_NAME}' ({GUILD_ID}) with {MEMBER_COUNT} members and {MEMBER_CACHE_BEFORE_COUNT} in the cache before and {MEMBER_CACHE_AFTER_COUNT} after the fetch.
error.commandGuild: [{MESSAGE_ID}] An error occurred while executing the '{COMMAND_KEYWORD}' command for user '{SENDER_TAG}' ({SENDER_ID}) in channel '{CHANNEL_NAME}' ({CHANNEL_ID}) in guild '{GUILD_NAME}' ({GUILD_ID}).
error.apiRequest: An error occurred while processing a '{HTTP_METHOD}' request to '{URL}'.
error.birthdaySystemFailedForGuild: An error occurred while running the birthday system for '{GUILD_NAME}' ({GUILD_ID})!
error.memberAnniversarySystemFailedForGuild: An error occurred while running the member anniversary system for '{GUILD_NAME}' ({GUILD_ID})!
error.serverAnniversarySystemFailedForGuild: An error occurred while running the server anniversary system for '{GUILD_NAME}' ({GUILD_ID})!
error.celebrationServiceForGuild: An error occurred while trying to run the celebration service for '{GUILD_NAME}' ({GUILD_ID})!
